title: Hint
text: Resolve the forces into components and use Newton's Second Law to calculate the horizontal component of the force. Compare with the weight of the passenger.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Resolve the forces into horizontal and vertical components. Step 2: Use Newton's Second Law to calculate the horizontal component of the force. Step 3: Calculate the ratio of the calculated force to the weight of the passenger. Step 4: Clearly show all calculations and units.
